parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range for the subinterval. The value is a UNIX timestamp that represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search statement. Only search statements are supported. Analytic statements are not supported. For more information about the syntax of search statements, see [Search syntax](~~43772~~).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end of the time range for the subinterval. The value is a UNIX timestamp that represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC.
